item.title: Generating OCI architectural diagrams using Diagrams
item.description: What is # Diagrams Diagrams is an OSS that creates files of various architecture diagrams by writing code in Python. The version at the time of publication of this article is 0.6.2. It is possible to generate architecture diagrams of Oracle Cloud, on-premises, Kubernetes, AWS, Azure, GCP, Alibaba Cloud, and a mixture of these architecture diagrams. This article is based on OCI, but the basic usage is the same for architecture diagrams other than OCI, only the packages to be imported are different.
